name: TheWebFellas
tag_list: agile-development, agile, ruby, rails, ruby-on-rails, scala, lift, erlang, sinatra, application-development, start-ups, enterprise, rapid-development, training, coaching, auditing, rescue, open-source
overview:
TheWebFellas are an agile development consultancy delivering bespoke applications to both start-ups and enterprise customers, as well as incubating and developing their own products.

Services include application and product development, code audits and review, training and coaching, ‘rescue’ missions for struggling projects and cloud computing architecture consulting.

Using flexible frameworks such as Rails, Sinatra and Lift allows applications to be developed more quickly and iteratively, while ensuring the use of the best tools for the job ensures excellent application performance.

TheWebFellas core team consists of a number of professionals with over 10 years’ experience and a variety of experience with companies such as IBM, Accenture and Detica.

Keen advocates of Open Source, TheWebFellas maintain an active blog with in-depth articles and tips on topics from Ruby on Rails to cloud computing with the Amazon EC2 platform. They are also regular contributors to Open Source projects via github and also by patches submitted to frameworks themselves.
